title: Save the refugees
content:
r. Talk to Halsin the next day to complete this quest. If you sides with the druids but still wishes to meet Minthara at the Moonrise Towers, she must be knocked out when fought. This can be done whether at her camp in the Shattered Sanctum or when defending the grove from the goblin attack. If Minthara is knocked out in the goblin camp the party must not take a Long Rest before the quest Defeat the Goblins is finished.
